CustomField.description: Street address including apartment/unit number. Full address line for mailing and verification. No validation required - just capture the information provided. Example: "123 Main Street, Apt 4B".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the street address including apartment or unit number if applicable (e.g., "123 Main Street, Apt 4B"). This is used for mailing program materials and verification.
CustomField.label: Street
